name: 蕭榮修
objective:
1. 集合，序列與函數
2. 基礎邏輯
3. 關聯式
4. 計數（排列，組合）
5. 圖與樹（基礎圖論）
6. 遞迴式與演算法
7. 有向圖
Objectives: This course covers the part of mathematics devoted to discrete events, i.e., events that involve distinct or unconnected elements, finite structures of distinct elements. These topics are very useful in the study of computer science --- especially in the areas of data structure, the analysis of algorithms, and the theory of computer languages.
schedule:
‧ Introduction
‧ Logic and Proof
‧ Sets, Relations, and Functions
‧ Recursion, and Algorithms
‧ Counting, and Probability
‧ Recurrence Relations
‧ Graphs Theory
‧ Trees
‧ Automata, Grammars, and Languages
